about_the_game:
You think a combat knife is a good option to face the infected??
Here, have two... good luck!
This DLC contains a weapon: Dual Combat Knives.

name: How To Survive 2 - Combat Knives

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or Radeon R7 200 series - DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card

short_description: You think a combat knife is a good option to face the infected?? Here, have two... good luck!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
